languages.text: "Истинного вождя зовут они "Предком" — нечто, что культ породило. Сосуд ксеноереси, хищник свирепый, но хитрый. Волей незримой в узел единый их разум сплетает... Тот узел должно рассечь".

"They call the true master 'the Sire,' it which spawned the cult. A vessel of xenoheresy, a fierce yet cunning predator that twists their minds into a single knot with only its will... That knot must be severed."
languages.original_text: "Истинного вождя зовут они "Предком" — нечто, что культ породило. Сосуд ксеноереси, хищник свирепый, но хитрый. Волей незримой в узел единый их разум сплетает... Тот узел должно рассечь".

traits.locale_text: "They call the true leader 'The Ancestor', something that spawned the cult. A vessel of xeno-heresy, a fierce yet cunning predator that twists their minds into a single knot with his will... That knot must be severed."

"They call the true leader 'The Ancestor', something that spawned the cult. A vessel of xeno-heresy, a fierce yet cunning predator that twists their minds into a single knot with his will... That knot must be severed."

"They call the true leader 'The Ancestor,' the being that spawned the cult. It is a vessel of xeno-heresy, a fierce yet cunning predator that twists their minds into a single knot with only its will... That knot must be severed."

"They call the true leader 'The Ancestor,' the being that spawned the cult. It is a vessel of xeno-heresy, a fierce yet cunning predator that twists their minds into a single knot with only its will... That knot must be severed."

"They call the true master 'the Sire,' it which spawned the cult. A vessel of xenoheresy, a fierce yet cunning predator that twists their minds into a single knot with only its will... That knot must be severed."

"They call the true master 'the Sire,' it which spawned the cult. A vessel of xenoheresy, a fierce yet cunning predator that twists their minds into a single knot with only its will... That knot must be severed."

languages.text: «Llaman "Progenitor" al verdadero amo que dio origen a su culto. Es un receptáculo de xenoherejía, un depredador tan feroz como astuto, que retuerce sus mentes para crear un solo nudo dirigido por su voluntad. Debemos cortar ese nudo».
languages.original_text: "They call the true master 'the Sire,' it which spawned the cult. A vessel of xenoheresy, a fierce yet cunning predator that twists their minds into a single knot with only its will... That knot must be severed."

traits.locale_text: «Llaman "Abuelo" al verdadero amo que dio origen a su culto. Es un receptáculo de xenoherejía, un depredador tan feroz como astuto, que retuerce sus mentes para crear un solo nudo dirigido por su voluntad. Debemos cortar ese nudo».

languages.text: 「奴らは真のマスターを『サイアー』と呼ぶ。教団を生んだ男だよ。異種族の器で、獰猛かつ狡猾な捕食者、民の精神をその意志のみでひとつの結び目にねじ込む…その結び目は断ち切らなければならない」
languages.original_text: "They call the true master 'the Sire,' it which spawned the cult. A vessel of xenoheresy, a fierce yet cunning predator that twists their minds into a single knot with only its will... That knot must be severed."

traits.locale_text: 「奴らは真のマスターを『グランドファーザー』と呼ぶ。教団を生んだ男だよ。異種族の器で、獰猛かつ狡猾なプレデター、民の精神をその意志のみでひとつの結び目にねじ込む…その結び目は断ち切らなければならない」

languages.text: “那些怪物称他们真正的主人为‘族长’，是它创立了这支邪教。它是异形教派的首脑，是位凶猛而狡诈的掠食者。它仅仅凭借意志的力量，就将所有人的思想打成了扭曲的死结……这个结必须解开。”
languages.original_text: "They call the true master 'the Sire,' it which spawned the cult. A vessel of xenoheresy, a fierce yet cunning predator that twists their minds into a single knot with only its will... That knot must be severed."

traits.locale_text: “那些怪物称他们真正的主人为‘祖父’，是它创立了这支邪教。它是异形教派的首脑，是位凶猛而狡诈的掠食者。它仅仅凭借意志的力量，就将所有人的思想打成了扭曲的死结……这个结必须解开。”

languages.text: "Sie nennen den wahren Meister 'Schöpfer', da er den Kult hervorgebracht hat. Ein Gefäß der Xeno-Ketzerei, ein wildes, aber listiges Raubtier, das den Verstand aller zu einem einzigen großen Knoten verdreht, allein mit seinem Willen ... Dieser Knoten muss durchtrennt werden."
languages.original_text: "They call the true master 'the Sire,' it which spawned the cult. A vessel of xenoheresy, a fierce yet cunning predator that twists their minds into a single knot with only its will... That knot must be severed."

traits.locale_text: "Sie nennen den wahren Meister 'Großvater', das, was den Kult hervorgebracht hat. Ein Gefäß der Xeno-Ketzerei, ein wildes, aber listiges Raubtier, das den Verstand aller zu einem einzigen großen Knoten verdreht, allein mit seinem Willen ... Dieser Knoten muss durchtrennt werden."

languages.text: « Ils appellent "le Sire" le véritable maître à l'origine du culte. Un réceptacle de xénohérésie, un prédateur féroce et rusé qui noue les esprits de la seule force de sa volonté... Ce nœud doit être défait. »
languages.original_text: "They call the true master 'the Sire,' it which spawned the cult. A vessel of xenoheresy, a fierce yet cunning predator that twists their minds into a single knot with only its will... That knot must be severed."

traits.locale_text: « Ils appellent Père le véritable maître à l'origine du culte. Un réceptacle de xénohérésie, un prédateur féroce et rusé qui noue les esprits de la seule force de sa volonté... Ce nœud doit être défait. »

languages.text: "Hakiki üstatlarına 'Efendi' diyorlar. Tarikat ondan doğmuş. Zeno kâfirliğinin bir aracı, acımasız olduğu kadar kurnaz da olan bir yırtıcı. Zihinlerini sadece kendi iradesini barındıran tek bir düğümle bağlıyor... Bu düğümün kesilmesi gerek."
languages.original_text: "They call the true master 'the Sire,' it which spawned the cult. A vessel of xenoheresy, a fierce yet cunning predator that twists their minds into a single knot with only its will... That knot must be severed."
